name: Explosion (Markt & Technik)
overview: A Pong/Arkanoid style game published in 64'er Sonderheft 97 and also in 64'er 1998/06. This game comes with a level editor that can do up to 22 levels. Explosion — blast the energy wall! The deadly barrier Not only on earth, also in the universe living space has become scarce: a wild horde of aliens has chosen our planet to be their new home. A diabolical plan to exterminate humanity... Highest alert: Forward space watch stations near the asteroid belt report the approach of a colossal armada of space cruisers from the Vega system — apparently Earth is the target. In feverish haste, the World Defense Ministry is mobilizing all available space fleets and interceptors; the nerves of the ground troops are on edge—any second the first deadly laser bomb could hit the surface of the earth! Suddenly the outposts report that the enemy spaceships have stopped immediately after entering the stratosphere, but are in the process of building up a dangerous energy wall in the atmosphere at lightning speed. at a safe distance, countless space bombs are supposed to wipe out all life on earth. The W.D.O (World Defense Organization) took this emergency into account a long time ago and developed the prototype of an interceptor space cruiser whose energy protection screen is insensitive to all previously known radiation and laser bombs and even throws attacking objects back where they came from!
